t: Amazon.com: Porter Robinson: Worlds Vinyl 2LP: CDs & Vinyl
s: Sure, it may be electronic/dance music, but it's...different. The whole message of Worlds is that dance/electronic music is becoming too formulaic and "DJ friendly", and that EDM is becoming ugly because of that. Porter Robinson speaks out about this directly in Worlds.

EXCELLENT! Love Porter Robinson! ... My son pre-ordered this LP and couldn't be happier. While this is not my style of music I do find it enjoyable. The vinyl itself is nice and thick and should last for years of extended play!
